summary: This test module validates the Prefect command‑line interface for managing blocks, covering installation of system block types, creation, deletion, inspection, and listing of blocks, as well as registration of block definitions from files or modules and handling of error conditions such as missing resources, syntax errors, and protected types.
business_intent: Guarantee that users can reliably perform block‑related operations via the Prefect CLI, confirming correct behavior across normal and edge‑case scenarios to maintain system integrity and user experience.
